description: The Palmyrah House is one of the few  proper hotels in Mannar.  The management has embraced the island's flora and fauna, creating an eco-friendly boutique hotel that offers a memorable experience.

name: Dilmah t-Lounge
description: Dilmah's charming tea lounge in the shadow of Dutch Hospital is still going strong, with a range of hot and cold teas and little and large bites.

There aren’t too many places in the world where one can sit down for a 24 course meal in a supposedly high-end restaurant for $20. This is, de facto, a fun experience and the knowledge that your wallet will emerge relatively unscathed provides a constant sop to the disappointment the taste buds feel as each course emerges.
address: Cinnamon Grand, Shri Uttarananda Road, Colombo 3
name: Tao (Cinnamon Grand)
Thinesh Bake House
description: You'll be pleasantly surprised by the quality of the breads, biscuits and baked goods at this Jaffna bakery and cafe.
As far as beach bars go, Shore By O! is by far the most popular. Not all their drinks are excellent, but they do the best beer cocktails around and their bites aren’t too shabby either.
name: The Shore By O!
Shahla's Baked Bliss
description: Shahla's Baked Bliss is a home baker who specializes in jars full of toothsome goodies. It's not too pricey and her jars and brownies are top notch.

name: Lion Pub
description: The Lion Pub has the best entrance of any bar in Colombo and really cheap beer and good food in large portions

name: The Fab (Wattala)
description: Fab is one of the older and more established bakeries in town. The franchise is well known for its cakes.

name: Contemporary Ceylon
address: Colombo 3. You can book a dinner by appointment only.
description: A home-catering service with a difference, Contemporary Ceylon is one of the city's best-kept secrets.

name: Loon Tao
description: Loon Tao, roughly meaning "Way of the Dragon" has lost its claim as a top contender in the Chinese restaurant racket.
Yala is Sri Lanka's wildlife central, and thousands of people flock the National Park every year for a chance to spot wildlife, especially the elusive Lankan leopard.
name: Yala National Park (Safari)
Heladiv Tea Club (Bar)
address: Dutch Hospital Shopping Precinct, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Colombo 1
description: Heladiv Tea Club is one of Dutch Hospital's many eateries. We've been there a few times and we've come to enjoy it as a quiet hang out for a quick bite or dessert. While slightly unconventional, it's also a great place for drinks, which is what this review is all about.

name: Fazly's Halal Refreshment
description: Fazly's Halal Refreshment is one of Colombo's most popular streetside haunts, known for their delicious, mayo dripping, affordable fare.

name: Flavors (Galadari)
description: Flavors is Galadari Hotel's Indian restaurant. Their food is actually pretty decent, but the ambience, or rather the lack of it makes you want to wrap up your meal as fast as possible.

name: Sawadee (Mount Breeze Hotel)
address: 22/5A, Mount Breeze Hotel, Off De Saram Road, Mount Lavinia, Colombo
description: The Sawadee , a part of Mount Breeze Hotel offers reliable food and service at reasonable prices.

name: Family Baker
description: Family Baker is arguably the best mainstream bakery in Mount Lavinia. They've got a great selection of both savories and sweets, which have been consistently tasty time and time again.

name: The Ceylon City Hotel
description: The Ceylon City Hotel is one of the newer new age hotels in Colombo. It's got good facilities at decent prices.

name: Upali's
description: Upali's does affordable and tasty Sri Lankan food.
Hana Mart, while small, sells a good selection of fun Korean food. Shrimp crackers, ramen, kimchi, biscuits and so on.
name: Hana Mart
Sulthan Palace
address: 45A, C W W Kannangara Mawatha, Colombo 7
description: Sulthan Palace (formerly Rahumania) is a great spot at the Town Hall hub to get a delicious, cheap range of biriyanis, meats and even Sri Lankanized Chinese.
The Elephant Rock is a nice, sort-of-private beach in Pasikuda, marked by a small elephant shaped rock, with plenty of shore to chill on unlike most of Pasikuda now.
name: Elephant Rock (Pasikuda)
Cafe Eklektik
description: Cafe Eklektik is a little courtyard canteen of sorts inside the German Cultural Center. It's good for lamprais, shorteats, fresh juices and some conversation under the trees.

name: Poonie's Kitchen
description: Poonie's Kitchen is a wonderful hidden oasis in the Galle Fort. They serve high quality desserts and deliciously prepared dishes at surprisingly good prices.

name: Praneetha
description: Praneetha is a small eatery that serves up a great rice and curry with the option of every kind of meat, from prawns to pork.

name: The Colombo Cafe
description: The Colombo Café  is a new competitor in Colombo’s café square off. While the prices of sandwiches and shakes can put your wallet on the endangered list, their Sri Lankan Buffet deal is the best deal we’ve come across.
The Mari Amma Kovil is a small, beautiful Hindu temple in Pasikuda that's about seven centuries old. It's still in very good condition, attracting devotees of mostly Goddesses Mari and Kali.
name: Mari Amma Kovil (Pasikuda)
Panino (Cotton Collection)
description: Panino specialises in sandwiches. In melts, to be specific. They also have a killer hot sauce.

name: Wijaya Beach
description: An old favourite, Wijaya Beach continues to serve up fresh seafood, excellent pizza and a sun-dappled ocean view.

name: Bombay Sweet House (Kollupitiya)
description: Sadly closed, after years. Bombay Sweet House is the original Sri Lankan candy shop, the city's oldest candy makers, and still remains the best place for Indian sweets and a fresh glass of Faluda.

name: Anna Marie Bakery
description: The Anna Marie Bakery sounds like a place from a Beatrix Potter book. The food might as well be from the books too.

The Governor's Restaurant at Mt.Lavinia Hotel offers one of the better buffets in the city. We found that mostly everything tasted good, with an exceptional salad bar and arguably the best selection of desserts around.
address: No 100, Hotel Road, Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka.
name: Mount Lavinia Hotel Buffet

description: Pagoda Tea Rooms is basically the only place to chill out at on Chatham Street - it's in a lovely building from all the way back in 1884. They do a super lamprais, and fun fact: Duran Duran shot a music video here.
name: Pagoda Tea Rooms
Cafe Shaze
description: Cafe Shaze is another one of Colombo's many cafe-restaurant-lounges. They serve the usual Western dishes, mocktails and coffees - the food is alright and it's pretty much on par with other cafes.
A good drink, bites and lively conversation all tucked away in Colombo 5 – this is really the club for Colombo’s gentlemen of class and distinction.
name: Randoli Sports Club

description: Latitude at Taj Samudra offers one of the more expensive lunch buffets in Colombo. While they don’t particularly specialise in a particular area, they offer a satisfying spread overall.
address: Taj Samudra, Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 3
name: Latitude (Buffet, Taj)
Thai Heritage (Galle Dutch Hospital)
address: 1st Floor, 10-02, Old Dutch Hospital, Hospital Street, Galle Fort, Galle
description: Thai Heritage is one of the many chic little restaurants on the foyers of the Old Dutch Hospital building in the Galle fort. The food though not striving for authenticity, is still alright, and somewhat on par with most fancy diners in the fort.
Mango House is a wonderful, simple little retreat in the Galle Fort. It's a villa-meets-boutique-hotel, cosy, restful and not so expensive.
address: 3, Layn Baan Cross Street,  Galle Fort, Galle
name: Mango House
Grandpila Family Restaurant
description: Pilawoos, the biggest players on Colombo's kottu scene, have set up a bigger, more family friendly restaurant on Marine Drive. The kottu and iced milo are still stellar.
Tea Avenue is a very cosy stop on Barnes Place to have a good cup of flavoured tea and some bready goods. The prices are good and the ambience is suited for all kinds of meetups.
name: Tea Avenue
Flavoured (Cinnamon Red)
description: Flavoured at Cinnamon Red, with their lean luxury theme, offers a curated menu with good variations at reasonable prices. They've got a good view of Colombo, tasty mains and excellent desserts, albeit with slightly slow service.

name: Kami Maki (Delivery)
description: Kami Maki is one of two Japanese delivery spots in Colombo. The sushi may not be the best in town, but it’s not too bad and the delivery is fast and reliable.

name: Qbaa
description: Qbaa is one of the more mature bars in Colombo, and they also house a fully fledged restaurant which is actually pretty great.

name: Sponge
description: Sponge is one of the oldest bakeries in the big city, and one of the biggest. They are still going strong with a quality range of savouries and sweets, and now also lamprais and gourmet sandwiches.

name: Trainspotter (Global Towers Hotel)
address: 11, Global Towers Hotel, Marine Drive, Wellawatta, Colombo 06
description: Trainspotter at Global Towers is one of the few restaurants that's open 24 hours a day. Unfortunately, the entire experience is mediocre at best.

The Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage is one of the most popular excursions and tourist destinations since it's inception back in 1975. It's a rare opportunity to get up close and personal with the elephants, which makes for a memorable experience.
name: Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage
Flower Drum
description: Good ambience, decent food, over-rated chili paste. Okay value for groups.
This simple clock tower has an emotional attachment for most Sri Lankans. It is also roughly kilometer zero, the distance of all major roads is calculated from the President's House next door.
address: Janadhipathi Mw and Chatham Street, Colombo 1
name: Colombo Fort Clock Tower

description: The ultimate Colombo street sweet.
name: Bombai Muttai Man
Dilan's Crab
description: A simple home cook that serves shelled crab - a real pleasure to eat.

name: Delish
description: Delish is a quaint, fun little place to chill out at right smack in the middle of Havelock Town. The food is okay, the drinks are great, it's all affordable - and get this, you can play video games here too.

name: Spice Coast
description: Spice Coast has good Indian food on Marine Drive. We personally think this is an ideal place for Indian takeaway/delivery and not a bad place to dine in.

name: Nordic House (Hikkaduwa)
description: Really tasty burgers, but not cheap.
Fresheta is a small juice bar at the top of Chithra Lane. They serve up some refreshing, tasty juices which really hit the spot on a scorching day.
name: Fresheta

description: This small cinema has one hall with very comfortable lounge chairs (Gold) and another regular hall (Deluxe)
name: Empire Cineplex (Independence Arcade)

description: Sahan Agro is one of the handful of places in Colombo where you can get organic vegetables and fruits, and other natural products like bee's honey.
address: Economic Center, off Kirimandala Mawatha, Narahenpita
name: Sahan Agro

description: Saaraketha is probably the best-known supplier of organic produce in Colombo. They've got a charming little shop down Ward Place.
name: Saaraketha
Streat360
description: Streat360 is an interesting little restaurant featuring 'street food' from different countries. The interior is quite chic and rustic, but it's kinda overpriced.
CLOSED. Segways are now in Sri Lanka, and it's not too pricey considering how cool it is. The segway rides also include fun interactive tours in Colombo and Galle.
name: Segways In Sri Lanka (Amazing Adventures SL) (RIP)
Sherry Land Restaurant & Pub
description: Sherry Land is a restaurant and pub in Negombo that offers one of the best cocktail menus we've come across in recent times, with some good food to boot.

name: Burger Queen
address: No. 98, Sri Saranankara Road, Kalubowila, Dehiwala
description: If you thought you'd tried the entire local burger monarchy, think again, cause we just found Burger Queen. It may not blow your mind, but they've got some interesting additions along with the usual favourites.

name: Malay Street Buth Kade
description: This basic buth kade serves a good rice and curry and sorta specializes in baabath (tripe - ie cow stomach).

name: Diwan Restaurant
description: Diwan is a new multi-cuisine restaurant on Sri Saranankara Road. It's mostly known for it's Indian cuisine, which is what we tried, but they also offer Chinese and Italian.

name: Jeorgie's Healthy Style Food
description: Jeorgie's is a new burger place in Nawala - the burgers are huge (and not so healthy), and the fruit smoothies are amaze.

name: Pho Vietnam
description: Pho serves up simple and healthy Vietnamese food. It's not as flavorful as we'd like, but they're very new and we think they'll improve.
The Beach is an all suite hotel in Negombo. They've got an unbeatable location, breathtaking views of the ocean and sunset, good food at their rooftop restaurant and great service.
name: The Beach (All Suite Hotel)

description: The Barnesbury is another cafe in Colombo. They've got a lovely garden out back, interesting London themed decor and they do an ordinary range of generic Western dishes.
name: The Barnesbury
Buba Restaurant And Beach Club
description: Buba Restaurant and Beach Club is one of Colombo's older beach hangouts. They've got pretty secluded part of Mt.Lavinia beach to themselves, seafood is decent plus its mostly BYOB ;).
Majestic City is one of Colombo's oldest malls - where you get everything from shoes to electronics. Here's a breakdown of where to find what at MC.
name: Majestic City
Amrith
description: Amrith has moved to a new location. The food is still consistent and while they aren't the best in town, they're still a valid option for Indian food.

name: Yumi Cake
description: Yumi Cake is a cute little restaurant that serves awesome desserts - chocolate fudge lovers, this is your haven.

The Silva Treehouse is an amazing AirBnB getaway in Unawatuna. It's basically a beautiful large glasshouse - quiet, clean, with a soothing green view of surrounding jungle and the ocean in the distance.
name: Silva Tree
The Vu
description: The Vu is the rooftop restaurant at The Beach in Negombo. It may be a new venture, but the food is good, the service is excellent and as you'd expect, the view is spectacular.

name: Spaghetti & Co
description: This Hikkaduwa institution does decent Italian.

name: Maharaja Palace
description: Maharaja Palace is one of the few fine dining Indian restaurants in Colombo. The prices are high but the portions are actually quite large now. Their food was always pretty good and it seems they've made some necessary improvements.

name: OZO Kandy
description: OZO is a big, modern hotel in the Kandy city center. The restaurant and the roof bar are worth checking out.

name: Hash Deli
address: Good Market (Diyatha Uyana), Polduwa Road, Ethul Kotte, Battaramulla
description: Hash Deli is an awesome homebaker of cakes that has shot to popularity through Good Market. They make a killer cheesecake.

name: Flag And Whistle
address: 5th Floor, Setmil Maritime Centre, 256, Srimath Ramanathan Mawatha, Colombo 15
description: If you make it to the north side, Flag And Whistle is a well-appointed space with a view of the port. They do hearty but expensive German fare.

name: Hotel de Majestic
description: Hotel de Majestic is one of the oldest kottu-and-biriyani stops on the Bamba Galle Road stretch. It's a popular and easily accessible stopover for biriyani and a quick cold drink.

Palmyrah has long been one of the best places in the city for Sri Lankan food. They've expanded well into Western and Indian too, the food is great, and it's also a comfy, quiet, chilled space to dine at.
name: Palmyrah (Hotel Renuka)
Peach Valley
description: Peach Valley is an old favourite when it comes to Sri Lankanized Chinese in Colombo. While the food itself hasn't changed much the recent renovations have done a great deal to help the look and feel of the place.

name: Miss Whisk
description: Miss Whisk is another Colombo home baker,  and she does interesting themed cupcakes and some delicious strawberry tarts.
Note that our review here is outdated. This hotel is no longer managed by Jetwing.
name: Coral Rock By Bansei
The Ocean (The Kingsbury)
description: The Ocean is the Kingsbury's seafood restaurant. The food is fresh off the ice onto the pan - it's good, and they also do a decent, affordable sashimi.
Ruwanweliseya is the most venerated and well-known stupa in Sri Lanka
name: Ruwanweliseya
Oven Geeks
description: Oven Geeks is a family restaurant tucked away on Templers Road in Mount Lavinia. The food and ambiance is decent and it’s the sort of place you rely on when you’re in the mood to hangout with your friends and grab a quick meal.
Jetwing Lagoon is a very cool luxury hotel in Negombo. What's unique about it how environmentally friendly they are, also their 100 meter long infinity pool.
name: Jetwing Lagoon
The Sushi Bar (Samurai)
description: This Japanese stopover is a wonderful addition to Negombo's popular stretch of restaurants. The food and service are great and they've got a sushi conveyor belt in the evenings.

name: The Chariot (Bambalapitiya)
description: The Chariot, most popular for their branch in Dehiwala, is an accessible and affordable stop for baked goods and rice and curry.

name: Paradise (Sri Lankan Vegetarian Food Court)
description: Paradise is a convenient vegetarian rice and curry stop next to the Sri Sambuddhatva Jayanthi Mandira. It's easy on the wallet and they've also got a juice bar.

Calamansi Cove by Jetwing is a villa based boutique hotel in Balapitiya. They offer spacious rooms in a serene, secluded setting overlooking the Balapitiya beach, and one of the best restaurants we've come across down south.
address: Wijerama Temple Rd, Balapitiya, Sri Lanka
name: Calamansi Cove by Jetwing
Chinatry
description: Chinatry is an Sichuan Chinese restaurants.  The punchy, spicy flavors are authentic but still good for the Sri Lankan palate.

name: Poppy Hana
address: Liberty Arcade, R. A. de Mel Mawatha, Colombo 3.
description: Poppy Hana, with their sushi conveyer belt is a fun place to dine, but the sushi itself wasn't fresh.

name: Golden Dragon (Taj)
address: Taj Samudra, 25 Galle Face Center Rd, Colombo 3
description: Golden Dragon is the completely redone Taj take on Chinese cuisine. It has a stellar ambience and good food.

name: The Tangerine (Calamansi Cove)
address: Wijerama Temple Rd, Balapitiya, Sri Lanka
description: The Tangerine is a gem of restaurant hidden away in Balapitiya at Calamansi Cove by Jetwing. As far hotel restaurants go, this is one of the best we've tried in recent times. Delicious food, beautiful presentation and good service.

name: Terro's Pies & Roasts
description: Terro's Pies and Roasts is a home cook in Dehiwala that bakes some tasty pies and serves up some hearty roast meats. As far as home cooks go, we'd say she's a great pick for savory dishes.

name: Little Star
description: Little Star is a not-so-little bakery in Mount Lavinia with a reputation for their Sri Lankan sweets

name: Thai Cuisine La Rambla
description: La Rambla is a pleasant little restaurant tucked away down Hotel Road in Mount Lavinia. If you're looking for a quiet, private meal with good food and quick service, this is one we'd recommend. They now exclusively serve up Thai food under the same name and roof.

name: Olive Garden Restaurant
description: Olive Garden is another one of Colombo's many Chinese restaurants. The food is good and affordable, and they've got private rooms if you want to take a big crowd with you.

name: Eat Right
description: EatRight.lk is a delivery site with an exclusively healthy menu, from healthy wraps to healthy kottu. It's also got a lot of info on it to help you stay fit.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Sugar Rush is another home-baker who makes some very nice fudgey brownies, and a great creamy lemon cake.

name: Dilmi Roti Shop (Beach Corner)
description: Dilmi Roti Shop is one of the many roti shops in Mirissa. They serve chocolate rotis, pineapple rotis, cheese rotis and so on, and their milkshakes are awesome.

name: Domenico's
description: Domenico's, headed by the former chef at Santoré was great addition to Colombo's pizza scene in 2014. Now they've expanded their menu with some much needed meats and it's that much better.

name: Zephyr Restaurant & Bar
description: Zephyr is a very exciting new restaurant and bar on the Mirissa beach stretch. The food is good, and they've got a great ambience that sticks out from the rest.

name: Ginza On The Edge (Waters Edge)
description: Ginza On The Edge is the suburban successor to the Hilton’s  Ginza Hohsen. It's on the 1st floor of Waters Edge and offers high-end Japanese with excellent service to boot.
The rock island is basically a giant grassy land-mass in the ocean by the Mirissa beach - it's an amazing sight and an ideal spot to watch the sunset.
address: Mirissa Bay, off Matara Road, Mirissa
name: Rock Island (Mirissa)

description: Paradise Road Cafe is one of our favourite haunts, cocooned in a small, white, quiet space atop a lovely store full of antiques and art. The food and coffee are very good, and it's an excellent book nook.
name: Paradise Road Cafe
Tammy's
description: Tammy is a Colombo home baker that specializes in some unconventional cakes. Her repertoire includes bibikkan, love cake and juggery cake, all of which were excellent.
This is one of the better beach-side Mirissa restaurants if you want seafood. They also do a super banana & chocolate milkshake.
name: Mirissa Eye Beach Restaurant

description: Malee Book Centre is an underrated haven of Disney themed party equipment and stationery.
address: Malee Book Centre, 215, Havelock Road, Colombo 06
name: Malee Book Centre
Meringue
description: Meringue is a tiny little new bakery in Dehiwala run by a small group of folks. Their sweets are pretty good, but they need to offer more in terms of selection and probably have meringues in there as well.

name: Tea Triumph
description: Tea Triumph is a very cosy tea lounge down Marine Drive - they've existed since 1940, and have a lovely range of quality, locally-brewn tea.

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf (Liberty Plaza Podium)
address: First Floor, Liberty Plaza Podium, Colombo 3
description: Coffee Bean is slowly turning into Colombo's next Barista - this is the third branch to pop up in the city at another very central location. The coffee and food here taste alright and are pricey as usual, and it's a comfy quiet place to chill out at.

name: YUMI (Taj Samudra)
address: Taj Samudra, 25 Galle Face Center Rd, Colombo 3
description: YUMI is Taj Samudra's resident Japanese restaurant. What they lack in terms of variety they make up for with some delicious, specialized sushi in arguably the best setting for a Japanese restaurant in Colombo.

name: Ashik
description: Ashik was once a popular choice amongst the YAMU staff for their rice and curry. Our latest visit left a negative impact on us though, and here's why.

name: Nihonbashi (ODEL)
description: Nihonbashi is one of our most famous restaurants - they serve the best sushi in the city, fact. This is the place for Japanese fine cuisine.

name: Galle Caterers
description: Galle Caterers are one of the older caterers in Colombo with quite a large customer-base. We've tried their stuff on numerous occasions and they offer great value for money on top of consistent taste.

name: rare at Residence (Uga Residence)
description: Expensive, but probably the most modernist Sri Lankan cuisine you can get.

name: Heladiv Tea Club (Dutch Hospital)
address: Dutch Hospital Shopping Precinct, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Colombo 1
description: The Heladiv Tea Club does a relatively affordable range of tasty waffles, sandwiches and teas at the Dutch Hospital. You can also get a decent bottle of wine here for just Rs. 2000.

name: EAT (OZO Colombo)
description: Aside from their buffet, OZO actually has a pretty good a-la carte menu with an interesting range of dishes from burgers to steak.

name: Mango & Company
description: Mango & Company is yet another new home baker. What sets M & G apart is their cinnamon rolls which are some of the best we've had in Sri Lanka.

name: Udumbara JU Caterers
description: JU Caterers is an awesome rice & curry place - they combine tasteful ambience with bath kade prices.

name: Cafe Michaelangelo
description: Thin crust, wood-fired pizza, with toppings like Pol Sambol. Michaelangelo is good for delivery, if you're really patient.
ECSAT helps differently abled children in Galle.
name: ECSAT (Equality-based Community Support And Training)
Harpo's Pizza (Nugegoda)
description: Harpo's has a new stand-alone pizza parlor in Nugegoda. Almost by default it's one of the nicer places in that town now, and it makes for faster delivery to the suburbs - from Kotte to Battaramulla.

name: Calorie Counter
description: Calorie Counter with its emphasis on healthy eating was one of the best new additions to Colombo's restaurant scene in 2015. Now they've gone a  step further and introduced a pretty comprehensive breakfast menu, most of it actually tastes pretty great.

name: City Lights (Best Western)
description: City Lights is now VU Restobar.

name: Sri Siam
description: Sri Siam on W.A. Silva Mawatha is yet another new Thai restaurant. We had high hopes since it's run by Thai management, but the food just wasn't up to par.

name: 88 Chinese Seafood Restaurant
description: 88 Chinese Seafood Restaurant is a long time player in the local Chinese food scene. It's incredibly popular among b0th locals and Chinese expats, and while it wasn't terrible, it didn't really live up to the hype.

name: Candy Cakes
description: This home baker does cake jars, and jars full of all kinds of candy.

name: Oro 1889
description: With straightforward, authentic Neapolitan pizzas made in a wood-fired oven and simple yet chic décor, the family-run Oro 1889 is a treat.

name: Krishna (Arcade Independence Square)
description: Krishna is a good vegetarian spot for rice and curry and the likes at the Arcade. They're run by the same guys who run Mathura.

name: Sama Restaurant
description: Sama Restaurant is a new Arabian street food spot on Marine Drive. The value for money is undeniable, and the food is pretty authentic but it may not suit local palates too well.

name: Lil' Orbits (Majestic City)
description: Lil' Orbits is an awesome place to go to for your sugar cravings. The prices are alright and the chocolate sauce is gold.

Independence Square is still a great place to relax in Colombo. It's part monument, part park, part walking ground. It's main function seems to be as the place where Colombars go for their evening constitutional (walk).
name: Independence Square
The Gallery Café
description: The Gallery Cafe is one of those perpetually hip spots in Colombo. The ambience is one of a kind and the  food is consistently good, but it will leave a dent in your wallet.

name: Steam Boat (Mount Lavinia)
description: Steam Boat provides a lovely spot for sunset and wave watching. With an elevated cement and canopy dining area as well as shaded chairs and tables on the sand, venue wise they've got it spot on. Food, however, not so much.

name: Delifrance
description: Delifrance is a great place for fresh, filling sandwiches and quality pastries, in a lovely location. It's expensive though.

name: Indian Summer
description: Indian Summer is a slightly expensive Indian restaurant, with a great ambience.

name: Healthy Living
address: Delivery, Pick up location at Shrubbery Gardens.
description: When Healthy Living started off in 2013 they were known mostly for their healthy buth packets. Since then they've expanded their menu, so we went ahead tried pretty much everything.
The Castle Hotel is the finest of dodgy bars.
name: The Castle Hotel
Arabian Knights
description: After an initial hiccup, Arabian Knights has bounced back well. The food is nearly back to their former glory, and coupled with the new venue, things are looking up again.
Milk & Honey has impressive healthy food options, and really pleasant ambience. Also some of the best brownies in the city.
name: Milk & Honey Cafe

description: The Nelum Pokuna Art Street is Colombo's only or at least oldest 'street art' space: a long pavement stretch of paintings by local artists, opposite Viharamahadevi Park, frequented by art enthusiasts and tourists.
name: Nelum Pokuna Art Street

description: A whole grilled fish, a pile of garlic drenched prawns, some ice cold bottles of lion larger, the roar of the sea all to yourself on a weekday evening. This is what Haus Chandra/the Boat Haus Cafe offers.
name: Boat Haus Cafe (Haus Chandra)

description: Push is the only store in Colombo dedicated to skateboard equipment and streetwear fashion - the shop is pretty neat and has its own little skating ramp.
name: Push
Foodie Adventure
description: Foodie Adventure is a home cook in Nawala that does take away and delivery. We tried a bunch of her stuff and pretty much all of it was amazing. Which isn't something we say often.

name: The Dodol House
description: Dodol is a difficult dessert to find easily in Colombo shops - so we were ecstatic to find one that not only makes some but delivers dodol to your home.

name: Grand Beijing
description: Grand Beijing is another Chinese place around the Kollpity junction that serves up good, authentic dishes at affordable prices.

name: Yue Chuan (Kingsbury)
description: Yue Chuan is a fine dining Chinese restaurant located at the Kingsbury hotel. The food is good, but not excellent.
Don's Deli is a little bakery on Marine Drive that doubles as a favourite spot for lamprais, and they also serve seafood at Fat Crab upstairs.
name: Don's Deli
The Wonky Cookie Company
description: Wonky Cookie is an awesome home-baker that specializes in big, crumbly cookies in fun flavours like oreo and peanut butter.

name: Hotel Amirthaa
description: Amirthaa is a cheap, clean, pure-veg South Indian restaurant in Bambalapitiya. The place gets pretty hectic, but the food is good.
Jojo's is the queen of costume making in Colombo. Her work has been featured in big stage productions but you can also hire her costumes for pretty affordable prices.
address: 9/1, TG Jayawardena Mawatha, off Greenpath, Colombo 3
name: JoJo's

description: Glitteray is an online jewellery store that sells a select range of silver jewellery.
name: Glitteray
Ministry Of Crab (Dutch Hospital)
description: Ministry of Crab is a high-end restaurant on Dutch Hospital premises that specializes in crab cuisine - the food is just plain mouth-watering and the service is good.

name: Taprobane (Cinnamon Grand)
description: Taprobane's dinner buffet is pretty awesome. For just Rs. 2200, the spread's large and the food's top quality. Highlights? Their egg hoppers and their chocolate fudge.
This tiny memorial to Sri Wickrama Rajasingha in the Ceylinco parking lot is a quirky destination.
name: The Last King's Jail Cell

description: We liked Sugar Bistro in the past and three years down the line that still hasn't changed. Their food is tasty, they offer a great atmosphere for dining and the service is some of the best you'll experience in Colombo.
address: 89 Galle Road, Crescat Boulevard (adjacent to the Cinnamon Grand Hotel), Kollupitiya
name: Sugar Bistro & Wine Bar
Moon River
description: Besides one dish, Moon River gave us nothing to be happy about. We honestly cannot recommend it with all the new alternatives in Colombo.

name: Health Factor
description: Health Factor is an awesome little restaurant in Kohuwala that cooks up very tasty but healthy meals - at great prices.

name: Skrumptious (Arpico Super Center)
address: Arpico Super Center, Hyde Park Corner, Colombo 2
description: Skrumptious makes high quality brownies and chocolatey goodies - they now have a take-away spot at Hyde Park's Arpico.

name: Tsing Tao (Colombo Racecourse)
address: Race Course Promenade, Reid Avenue, Colombo 7
description: Tsing Tao is a fine dinning Chinese restaurant that strikes a good a balance between authentic and Sri Lankanized Chinese, in a chic and elegant setting.

name: Kinjou
description: Kinjou is one of the oldest Chinese restaurants in Colombo. Their stuff is as Sri Lankanized as it gets, but it's just okay at best.

name: Anilana Pasikuda (Restaurant)
description: Anilana is one of Pasikuda's big beachside hotels. They've got killer ambience late in the evening, and they do a very good Jaffna crab curry.
Here's a guide to going sailing on a yacht and snorkeling in Pasikuda, thanks to Sail Lanka - and it's surprisingly not too pricey either.
name: Sail Lanka Charter (Sailing In Pasikuda)

description: The National Postal Museum is a surprisingly well maintained collection elaborately detailing Sri Lanka's ...well you guessed it - postal history.
address: Postal Headquarters,  No 310, D . R .  Wijewardena Mw, Colombo 10
name: National Postal Museum
Kan Zaman
description: Kan Zaman is a new a Arabian restaurant that's taken the place of the former Angler in Mount Lavinia. They've only been open a few months, and while it may not suit everyone, their food is definitely authentic.

name: The High Que
description: CLOSED NOW. The High Que is a really pleasant coffee shop cum restaurant next to the Lionel Wendt. They use Italian ingredients, and they make a tasty burger and a range of steaks.

name: Cafe Domus
description: Domus is a small cafe across from the Galle Face Hotel. It does tasty food in a pretty chill atmosphere. It's not super cheap, but not super expensive either.

name: Noodles (Cinnamon Grand)
address: Cinnamon Grand Colombo, 77, Galle Road, Colombo 3
description: Noodles at Cinnamon Grand offers one the most complete dining experiences around the city at a surprisingly affordable price point, while maintaining a high level service.

name: Euphorium
description: Basically a place to have tea with a sweet Japanese auntie. They also sell well-chosen tea leaves. No food unless she gives you a biscuit.

name: Hazari's
description: Hazari's has managed to maintain their Middle-Eastern standard while moving to their new Marine Drive location.
BeanBag.lk makes beanbags that are generally more affordable than at your average store, in a range of shapes. They also do custom orders.
address:
No 109, Galle Road, Dehiwala South
Dehiwala
name: BeanBag.lk

description: Aranyani is a super initiative run by a handful of young animal lovers. They take the time to rescue homeless cats and dogs, take them to vets, have them sterilized, vaccinated and adopted.
name: Aranyani Animal Rescue & Haven Dog Hotel

description: Artworld is an art supplies shop in Dehiwala, with affordable, quality art materials. They've got brand favourites like Faber Castell, Pentel, Camel and Acron.
address: 34A, Galle Road (at the top of Ebenezer Place), Dehiwala
name: Artworld
Taste Of Asia
description: Taste of Asia is a very affordable favourite on Galle Road for hoppers and Jaffna food.

name: The Brown Bean Coffee
description: The Brown Bean Coffee has always been a favourite of ours at The Good Market. We finally managed to try out their stuff at their permanent stall at Lakpahana (within the Good Market Shop), and the coffee is as good as ever.
The Mirissa beach is arguably the cleanest, most photogenic beach on the island.
name: The Mirissa Beach

description: The Ratnagiri Temple is at the top of a little hill in Mirissa. It's a beautiful secluded space with a great view of the ocean and in-land forests.
name: Ratnagiri Hilltop Temple (Mirissa)
Tasty Caterers
description: Tasty Caterers is one of the better bakeries in Colombo. They've got a good range of savouries, and some of the best eclairs in the city.

name: Barracuda
description: We had a great time here. It's a friendly spot on the beach, very near Colombo, with good Chinese food. Doesn't get much better.
CLOSED. La Voile Blanche is a chic all-white beachside restaurant in Mount Lavinia. The service is friendly and the food is pretty good, albeit a bit expensive.
name: La Voile Blanche (RIP)
The Beach Wadiya
description: Beach Wadiya is an old school beachside restaurant in Wellawatte. The service is fast and the food is good, but not excellent.

name: Kaema Sutra
description: The new Kaema Sutra, moved from its previous premises in Arcade Independence to the plush Shangri La, still serves decent-ish food at high prices

name: Cafe Beverly
description: Cafe Beverly is a comfortable, affordable dining space in the premises of the Beverly Street shopping complex in Rajagiriya.
Happy Socks is a Swedish company that ships colorful dotty socks to more than 70 countries - including Sri Lanka.
name: Happy Socks
Lifestyle Gym Snack Bar
description: The snack bar at the Lifestyle Gym offers some very healthy drinks and wraps - also, yummy cookies.
Island Craft is a collaboration between Academy Of Design designers/marketers and craftspeople island-wide. The result is creative and affordable crafts and homewares.
name: Island Craft
Shanmugas
description: Shanmugas is one of the older and more reputed vegetarian Indian restaurants. They're definitely pricier than most places but the food is very good and the service is excellent.

name: Lantheruma (The Lantern)
address: De Fonseka Road, near Vajira Junction
description: Latheruma does a really tasty and cheap rice and curry lunch.

name: Dolce Italia
description: Dolce Italia is a new little bakery cum restaurant run by two Italians. They serve pastries and Italian favourites that are both authentic and affordable.

name: Clique Supper Club
description: Clique is one of Colombo's most creative restaurants. They do possibly the best steak in the city.
Sweet Wishes by Vish is a veteran among Colombo homebakers. Her bakes have survived the test of time and her new stuff and savouries taste delicious.
name: Sweet Wishes by Vish
Cafe On The 5th
description: Cafe On The 5th has been a local favourite for years, serving tasty food in a comfortable al fresco style atmosphere. Their quality has taken a nose-dive recently, though.

name: Saffron Persian Delights (Good Market)
address: Nuga Tree Car Park, Colombo Racecourse, Colombo 07
description: Saffron is a popular Iranian stall at Thursday's Good Market in Battaramulla. They serve some great Persian favourites, both sweet and savoury.

name: The Original Rocket Burger
description: Rocket Burger is the Galle Fort's only burger specialist.  The patties are well ground and they're usually very generous with stuffing -  you're going to spend Rs. 900 minimum for a burger here though.
Galle Face is Colombo's most frequented public park - it's crowded but still a great place to watch the sunset, fly kites and eat isso vade.
name: Galle Face Green
Brownie Lovin'
description: Brownie Lovin' is one of Colombo's awesome brownie bakers. The brownies are extremely gooey and chocolatey, and affordable.

name: Jeewa's Polos and Kuma's Natural Foods
address: Nuga Tree Car Park, Colombo Racecourse, Colombo 07
description: Jeewa's is a great place at the Good Market to have some proper Sri Lankan wraps, roast paan or roti, for cheap.

name: Cup Café
address: 6 C. W. W. Kannangara Mawatha (Baptist Chapel Road), Colombo 7, opposite ODEL
description: Cup Cafe is a simple and charming coffee shop with good food, drink and a pretty chill atmosphere.

name: Kami Maki
description: Kami Maki is a Japanese fusion restaurant in Bamabalapitiya. While it's not the most authentic Japanese in town, they do offer some interesting fusion dishes.

name: Mythi's
description: Mythi's is a small streetside restaurant on Fife Road that offers arguably the best black pork curry in Colombo, along with a killer rice and curry.

name: Sits
description: Sits has been our favourite cake baker for a while. Her chocolate and red velvet cupcakes are some of the best in town.

name: Life Food
description: Life Food is a low key health food stall that manages to keep things healthy and fresh while not compromising on flavour.

name: Smokey's (The Brownie Bar)
description: Smokey's is a home baker that specializes in delicious brownies at easy prices - and they happen to be completely vegan too.

name: Ammi's Meaty Delights
description: Ammi's Meaty Delights is a home cook that delivers Sri Lankan style meat dishes. We tried their beef, chicken and pork dishes and they all turned out be very satisfying.

name: Saffron and Vanilla
address: 91/16B, Midland Mawatha, Wattarappala Road, Mount Lavinia
description: Saffron and Vanilla is a home baker with international experience - she makes some amazing date cookies, and runs cookery classes.

name: Charcoal
description: Charcoal is Mount Lavinia's local coffee shop with really good food, coffee and a charming, cozy space.

name: Tom Yum
description: Tom Yum specializes in Thai street food. We think it's some of the best Thai around.

name: Min Han
description: Min Han (or Ming Han) is one of our favorite Chinese restaurants. It's cheap, super tasty and the waiter Wijapayala orders for you.

name: Curry Leaves
description: Curry  Leaves is one of Colombo's oldest Indian restaurants, but remains mostly under the radar. Their strength lies in their biryani, but the rest of the dishes were pretty ordinary.
The Sri Lanka Magic Circle is a state recognized institute of magicians that has been around since the 1920s. We learnt more about the history of magic in Sri Lanka from magician Ronald de Alwis.
name: The Sri Lanka Magic Circle
House Of Biriyani
description: House of Biriyani is a new biriyani delivery and take out in Kalubowila. They offer good value for money along with a solid roast chicken, but they also have room for improvement.

name: Bombay Sweet Park (Bambalapitiya)
address: 225, Visakha Road (at the Galle Road end), Galle Road, Colombo 04
description: Bombay Sweet Park is a small easily accessible shop in Bamba that does very good samosas and milkshakes - they've also got sweets and rice and curry.

name: VOC Cafe (Dutch Burgher Union)
description: The VOC is a one of the best places in the city to get lamprais, and we've heard their burgers are pretty good too.

name: Zen (Zylan Boutique Hotel)
description: Zen is Zylan boutique hotel's hidden gem of a Japanese restaurant. They made a great first impression on our visit, and we love their new bento boxes.

name: Barista Lavazza (Laksala Museum Gallery Cafe)
description: Barista is the biggest coffee shop franchise in Colombo. Though their Laksala branch is just as so-so as the others in terms of food and drinks, it's got a lovely park-like ambience.

name: Quick Thai (Colombo 7)
description: Quick Thai serves up pretty good, filling Thai dishes at affordable prices.
The Travelling Food Tuk is a lunch-delivery place - the food is home-made, gourmet even, and the prices not too bad.
name: The Travelling Food Tuk
Yumi Cake
description: Yumi Cake is a cute little restaurant that serves awesome desserts - chocolate fudge lovers, this is your haven.

The Bellanwila Raja Maha Vihara is a popular temple just outside of Colombo (Boralesgamuwa). The bodhi-tree on the temple premises is one of the thirty-two saplings from the sacred bodhi tree in Anuradhapura, distributed over 2000 years ago. It also known for its big, bright and beautiful statues and murals.
name: Bellanwila Raja Maha Vihara (Bellanwila Temple)
Pizza Hut
description: Pizza Hut's stuff isn't half bad, and their desserts are actually quite great, but the portions don't justify the prices.

name: Cricketers Arms (Bar)
description: TM Dilshan's bar has a great selection of imported liquors, some creative cocktails and good bar food.
Tropic of Linen is a great place for quality linen and cotton clothing at good prices. They're already popular in Galle.
name: Tropic Of Linen

description: Havelock Place Bungalow has got a charming little restaurant with a Barefoot-esque alfresco and good food. The prices aren't too bad, and their home-made ice cream is great.
name: The Havelock Place Bungalow

description: Colombo's only drive-through bakery. They've got good ice cream and amazing chocolate fudge cake.
name: The Bakery at the Edge (Waters Edge)

description: Splash is an international franchise with an awesome collection of casual and party wear. It's pricey, but they've got a great range of pants, tshirts and denims.
name: Splash
McDonald's Delivery (McDelivery)
description: We order from McDonald's far more than we probably should, but that's because their delivery is efficient, reliable and quite fast!

name: Siam House
description: Siam House serves up reliable and tasty Thai-fare, and they're built for volume and deliveries.

name: Hilton Residences Bar & Lounge
description: This rather busy bar has good food and drinks, but is quite expensive.

name: The Long Bar (Waters Edge)
address: Water's Edge, 316 Ethul Kotte Road, Battaramulla, Colombo
description: The Long Bar at Water's Edge has lovely location and pretty good food and drinks
Kitulgala is Sri Lanka's white water rafting central because of its access to the Kelani river. We stayed at Ceylon Adventures where we rafted, trekked and slid down mini waterfalls.
name: Kitulgala White Water Rafting (Ceylon Adventures)

description: HelpAge is a Sri Lankan charity that's very serious about caring for the elderly generation.
address:
HelpAge Sri Lanka P.O. BOX 09
102, Pemananda Mawatha,
Raththanapitiya, Boralesgamuwa.
name: HelpAge Sri Lanka

description: The Tommy Hilfiger store at the Arcade has got a decent selection for mostly men - great quality, big prices, and a wide range of plaid shirts.
name: Tommy Hilfiger (Arcade Independence Square)
The Spectrum
description: The Spectrum, formerly known as the Coco Fresh Bar, is a small waffle bar at the Liberty Arcade. The waffles are quite ordinary but they do a solid Milo shake.
The Maritime Museum in Galle showcases a collection of boat models, maps, artillery and things found from ship-wrecks, some almost a century old.
name: National Maritime Archaeology Museum (Galle)

description: Sizzle is an experience restaurant with a great selection of meats and even decent vegetarian. Everything is served sizzling, even the drinks.
name: The Sizzle
Banana Leaf
description: They do chicken biryani pretty darn good and now have crab and lamb on the menu.

name: Cannon Bar & Grill
address: Galle Dutch Hospital, Hospital Street, Galle Fort
description: Cannon is a bar in the Galle Dutch Hospital. Great location, OK food and drink.

name: Chinese Dragon Cafe
description: One of the oldest Chinese restaurants in Colombo, Chinese Dragon does an okay job.
Peeptoe does shoes with personality. They even have cute names.
name: Peeptoe
The Cakery
description: The Cakery used to be a resident favourite amongst the plebs at office, but they've long since dwindled in terms of service and food.
All that's left of what we think was a seven story palace is a few high walls in stone and brick. It was built in the late 1100s but is still impressive to this day.
name: Royal Palace - Vijayotpaya/Vijayanta - (Polonnaruwa)
The Brick Lane Cookie Company (Fort)
description: The Brick Lane Cookie Company opened up their newest stall in Fort a couple of weeks ago. We tried a bunch of their cookies along with their interesting new additions, and they were all pretty great.
Hansa Coffee is a great place for original Hansa coffee and chocolate, and brownies. It's an affordable, cosy coffee lounge.
name: Hansa Coffee
Klassy Pastry Shop
address: 2B De Fonseka Road, Colombo, Sri Lanka
description: Klassy is a really good pastry shop - reliable for savouries and milk toffees.

name: Anzu's Restaurant (Huang Xiang Ju)
description: Anzu's restaurant on Marine Drive (Colpetty) is a new and authentic Chinese eating house. While it may not suit everyone, it's a good option for those looking to experience Chinese home cooking.
CLOSED. Seems to have imploded financially, leaving debts all over. Damith is an excellent mens tailor. This outlet has higher-end stuff (imported fabrics, like Zegna) and some ready to wear items.
address: 19 First Flood, Main Wing, Arcade Independence Square, Colombo 7
name: KIITO Bespoke (Independence Arcade) (CLOSED)
Cakes & Things By Windya (Mt.Lavinia)
description: Cakes & Things by Windya is a home baker in Mount Lavinia. Her specialty is theme cakes, but her cupcakes and brownies are pretty great as well.

name: The Achcharu Kadé Cafe (Closed)
description: Achcharu Kade is a colourful little restaurant in Kollupitiya - good achcharu, superb rice & curry and bombai muttai ice cream.

name: The Achcharu Kadé Cafe (Closed)
description: Achcharu Kade is a colourful little restaurant in Kollupitiya - good achcharu, superb rice & curry and bombai muttai ice cream.
The All Saints' Church is a striking feature at the Galle Fort with its gothic columns and roof.
name: All Saints' Church (Galle)

description: The Three By TPV is a Swedish novelty store in the Galle fort with a quirky collection of interior decor, clothes and jewellery. P. Diddy and Julia Roberts are some of the celebs who trust their design.
name: The Three by TPV (Galle)

description: The Dutch Reformed Church of Kalpitiya is one of the oldest Protestant churches in Sri Lanka - it has tombstones in its floors and back garden, and is refreshingly simple compared to your average historic Dutch church.
name: Dutch Reformed Church (Kalpitiya)

description: The Dutch Reformed Church is one of the oldest Protestant churches in Sri Lanka. It has beautiful honeycomb style floors inside, and has a startling collection of stone carved tombstones worked into the floors and the garden.
name: Dutch Reformed Church (Galle)

description: Mondy is a popular shop for quality Women's office wear. They also do a pretty decent collection of shoes and accessories.
name: Mondy

description: The Moon Bastion (part of the Galle Fort) is the best place to catch the sunset.
name: Moon Bastion (Galle Fort)
Cafe Francais by Pourcel
description: Cafe Francais is the only and best French restaurant in Colombo. It's expensive but really high quality dining.

Khalid's Computer Solutions as the name suggests, is a one stop solution for all your laptop and PC repair needs. We recently took our laptop to him for repairs, and all we can say is that the man is a magician.
name: Khalid's Computer Solutions

description: The Mel's Tea Cafe is a tea cafe located in Colombo 8 that offers a selection of tea drinks, salads and snacks.
name: The Mel's Tea Cafe
The Cricket Club Cafe
description: The old classic at a brand new spot.
CLOSED. Scoop is a little ice cream shop located in Thimbirigasaya that sells a range of ice cream and dessert.
name: Scoop
Sweet Layers
description: Sweet Layers is a home baker based in Piliyandala. They offer a range of baked goods, but their pastries are what really sets them apart.

name: Nalapaham
description: Nalapaham is for those of you with a sudden mid-day craving for crab - besides the biriyani, idiyapam and kottu, they serve tasty crab, cheap.

name: Galle Heritage Villa
description: Galle Heritage Villa is a beautiful place to stay at in the Galle Fort - this massive house of sorts is by the same guys who brought us Jetwing Lighthouse.
House of Lonali is an ethical local brand owned by Lonali Rodrigo. They feature some unique and fresh designs.
name: House of Lonali

description: Coco Veranda on Ward Place is one of Colombo's most popular coffee shops. We loved them in the past, but this time around it was a let down.
name: Coco Veranda

description: Chatham is a luxury watch boutique that offers some of the most prestigious watch brands in the world including Omega, IWC and Jaeger-LeCoultre. With a great selection and highly knowledgeable employees, this place epitomizes class.
address: No. 41, Galle Road, Galle Face Court 1, Colombo 03
name: Chatham Luxury Watches
A Minute By Tuk (Galle Dutch Hospital)
address: Old Hospital Building, Galle Fort, Galle
description: A Minute By Tuk is a little eatery in the Galle Dutch Hospital. The ambience is cool since it's up on a deck, but the food is pricey and just okay.

name: Naniyori
description: Naniyori is good value for money.  Decent dine-in at Nawala and best sushi delivery in Colombo.

name: The Original Rocket Burger
description: Rocket Burger is the Galle Fort's only burger specialist.  The patties are well ground and they're usually very generous with stuffing -  you're going to spend Rs. 900 minimum for a burger here though.

name: Foodie-Colombo (Home Baker)
description: Foodie-Colombo is a home baker that's good at creamy chocolate frosting cupcakes, and cake popsicles.
House Of Wines is a new place down Flower Road which focuses only on wine and champagne. They have a thoughtful and well-curated selection of wines with a good amount of affordable ones in the mix.
name: House Of Wines
Indo Ceylon Cafe
description: Their coconut chutney lifts to high heavens an otherwise mediocre array of South Indian staples.

name: Mithuro Cafe
address: 9, R. A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 04
description: Mithuro Cafe does good rice and curry for cheap, and we especially love their 'chicken pieces' rotti.
MINI Opened up their very first showroom in Sri Lanka a few months back. We dropped in to have a look at their latest offerings and their pretty cool.
name: MINI Showroom

description: There are a lot of reasons to be at the Galle Fort rampart - from the super view of the sea and corals, to the snake charmers and guys who dive off small cliffs.
name: Galle Fort Ramparts
The Station
description: When it comes to value for money, The Station is pretty difficult to beat. They tick all the right boxes with their ambience, service and food.

Kyung Bok Kung at Hotel Juliana does a pretty authentic take on Korean cuisine. The setting might be slightly dubious, and the DIY style might not be for everyone, but order the right dishes and you'll be glad you dropped in.
name: Kyung Bok Kung
address: Juliana Hotel, 316 Galle Road, Kollupitiya, Colombo 3

description: The Hammock Cafe in the Galle Dutch Hospital has a great location and cool seating, but the food is pretty expensive and mediocre.
address: Old Dutch Hospital, Galle Fort, Galle
name: Hammock Cafe & Pub (Galle Dutch Hospital)
Malay Restaurant
description: Malay Restaurant in Dehiwala is hugely popular, and after trying our their stuff we can see why. The portions: massive, the flavours: excellent and the prices: reasonable.
Aussie Swim Store is a pretty cool place to drop by if you are into designer-made beachwear. Be it resort wear, sun hats and beach bags they have it all.
address: B-15, Crescat Boulevard, Basement Level, # 75, Galle Road, Colombo 03.
name: Aussie Swim Store

description: Cheeseland Inc. is a company that brings down specialty cheeses from Holand. We dropped in to see what they had on offer and to try out some of the cheeses.
name: Cheeseland Inc.
The Fab Cafe
description: The Fab Cafe, the coffee lounge by The Fab is relatively unknown cafe down Castle street. They've got a chic space and some great Hot chocolate.
Probably Sri Lanka's proudest monument.  The huge rock is worth a climb for any visitor.
name: Sigiriya
Dairy King
description: Dairy King is a good place to stop by for ice cream - and fat chocolatey brownies - if you're in Galle Fort.

name: Sakura Japanese
description: You've heard of Sri Lankan Chinese food, but Sri Lankan Japanese?  Well it exists and using the island's abundance of fresh sea food, Sakura has been serving up consistently good and affordable Japanese dishes since 1983.

name: Mathura Restaurant
description: Mathura is a decent Indian vegetarian restaurant that has been around Colombo for years, but now at a new location.
Aashkii at the Arcade is a chic store with a range of Indian and local designer clothing and quality saris.
name: Aashkii (Arcade Independence Square)
Infinity Cuisine
address: 536/15, Wijesinghe Gardens,  Kotte Road, Pita Kotte
description: Affordable and pretty tasty office lunches, with free delivery.

name: 168 Sea Food Palace
description: 168 Sea Food Palace is a veteran among Chinese eateries in Colombo and is still hugely popular among locals. They do a decent take on Sri Lankan Chinese with efficient, but the place looks quite run down now.

name: Peking Palace
description: Peking Palace in Nawala serves up some decent Sri Lankanized Chinese cuisine at an accessible location.
Kangaroo is not the cheapest cab, but it's probably the most professional and reliable.
name: Kangaroo Cabs
The Tuna & The Crab
address: Galle Dutch Hospital, Hospital Street, Galle Fort, Galle
description: The Tuna & The Crab is a mainly Japanese restaurant run by Sri Lanka's top chef Dharshan Munidasa in the Galle Fort. The quality is reliable but not game-changing, and the prices are high.
Buddhi Batiks takes the tradition of the batik industry and revamps them to create designer fashion.
name: Buddhi Batiks
Garton's Ark
address: Urban Wetland Park, 100 Nawala Rd, Nugegoda
description: Garton's Ark is a floating (boat) restaurant in the Nugegoda Wetlands Park.
Rithihi is more like a one stop store for handwoven traditional saris from various Indian States.
name: Rithihi

description: The Meeran Mosque in Galle Fort is beautiful on the inside with stained glass and lovely tiles on the floors.
name: Fort Meeran Mosque (Galle)

description: Mamas Guest House is a decent place to stop by for rice and curry and other meals in the Galle Fort. It's cosy and you can meet Mama herself.
address: 67, Small Cross Street, off Church Street, Galle Fort, Galle
name: Mamas Galle Fort Guest House

description: Serving the best handallo in town, the GSSC is a dodgy bar with cheap drinks and decent patrons.
name: Government Service Sports Club
Zen (Zylan Boutique Hotel)
description: Zen is Zylan boutique hotel's hidden gem of a Japanese restaurant. They made a great first impression on our visit, and we love their new bento boxes.
Cafe Hula Hula near the ramparts of Galle Fort serves good kottu, tasty seafood, and - yay! - we found great eclairs here.
name: Cafe Hula Hula (Galle)
The Chariot (Bambalapitiya)
description: The Chariot, most popular for their branch in Dehiwala, is an accessible and affordable stop for baked goods and rice and curry.
Meh. If you want not-fast fast food, Dinemore (which also has a branch on Marine Drive) is a more reliable option. While Redberry's has a good location, the food is mediocre.
name: Redberry's
Hulftsdorp Streetfood
address: Abdul Hameed Street, between Quarry Road and Oilman's Street
description: A street with a wide variety of food in the center of industrial Colombo. Find everything from mutton brain curry to devilled cuttlefish eggs.

name: Mayura Hotel
description: Mayura Hotel serves great rice and curry on banana leaves, and excellent Jaffna crab.

name: Crossroads
description: Crossroads, run by Tasty Caterers, is a good restaurant. With a funny menu dancing across a variety of cuisines (Thai, Western, Mexican, Italian, Sri Lankan) the food, while not authentic, lives up to the name of its proprietors and actually is quite tasty.

name: Tatlers Tea
description: Tatlers Tea is the usual YAMU tea break spot. It really isn't anything to write home about, but if you visit you just might bump into us!

name: Governor's Restaurant (Mount Lavinia Hotel)
description: The Governor's Restaurant at the Mount Lavinia Hotel is one of the few hotel restaurants that offers real value for money with their dishes.

name: Seasons
address: Liberty Plaza, Level 2, 250, R A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
description: Authentic biryani at affordable prices, Seasons is only held back by its dismal setting on the deserted second floor of Liberty Plaza.
A splinter cell of Quickee, Speedee.lk delivers where its competitors fail. From munchies, to ice, to rolling papers and condoms, they'll sort you out from 10AM to 4AM.
name: Speedee.lk
B: Us Chicken (RIP)
description: Korean fried chicken with some K-pop in the background.

name: Noodles (Cinnamon Grand)
address: Cinnamon Grand Colombo, 77, Galle Road, Colombo 3
description: Noodles at Cinnamon Grand offers one the most complete dining experiences around the city at a surprisingly affordable price point, while maintaining a high level service.
Buth Amma's Buth Kade is a hole-in-the-wall rice and curry spot in Bamba, run out of a family home for 68 years.
name: Buth Amma
Chapter One
address: 931C,  Ethul Kotte Road (Off Parliament Road), Ethul Kotte
description: With a great setting, decor and beautiful presentation, Chapter one disappoints when it comes down to execution.
Theva Residency is a small boutique hotel - and open restaurant - about a fifteen minute drive from Kandy's center. The view here of the empire city and the hills that surround it is spectacular.
name: Theva Residency
වාඩි Food (Pelawatta)
description: මිල ගණන් එක්ක බැලුවාම නම් වාඩි Food එකේ කෑම  වල රස ටිකක් විතර හොඳයි . ඒ වුනාට වැඩිපුර වියදම් කරල සුපිරි කෑම වේලක් කන්න තැනක් හොයන කෙනෙක්ට නම් මේ කඩේ හරියන එකක් නෑ මට හිතෙන්නෙ.

Cloud Red is the newest and highest rooftop bar in Colomb. The view from the top is spectacular, their cocktails are good and so is the food. The drinks are a bit pricey but with the ambience we don't really mind.
name: Cloud Red (Cinnamon Red)
Gorgeous Cakes
description: A home baker who specializes in something other than cupcakes and cookies.
Emerge works with teenage survivors of sexual abuse in Sri Lanka, helping them  heal, develop skills for self-sufficiency, and build a better future for themselves.
address: Emerge Lanka Foundation, No. 9/2-1/1, Edmonton Road, Kirulapone, Colombo 06
name: Emerge Global
Han Gook Gwan
description: Han Gook Gwan does a authentic take on Korean cuisine at a reasonable price. You'll most likely be walking away with a new found love for Korean cuisine.

name: Bliss Lounge
description: Bliss lounge is a Mediterranean sheesha lounge which serves Italian and burgers, among other things.

name: Huasui Chinese Restaurant
description: Huasui is yet another Chinese restaurant to join the many we've got in Colombo. The ambience is pretty pleasant and the food is nothing amazing compared to the flavour and portions in other Chinese restaurants, but it is good.

name: Theva Cuisine
description: Theva Cuisine is of Kandy's few good restaurants. With great breads, excellent dessert and friendly service, it's definitely worth a visit.
The YAMU office is a big A/Ced room full of reasonably nice, kind of weird people. The food appears almost once a week and the ambience is interesting.
name: The YAMU Office
Sanekvin Restaurant & Bar
description: හීනියට ලියල බැදපු කුකුල් මස් කෑලි, සොසේජස් කෑලි, තම්බපු ඉස්සො, බැදපු තෝර මාළු කෑලි හරි හරියට හැන්දට එද්දි දැනෙන සතුට රසටත් උඩින්.

name: Isso
description: Isso deals with isso. Curried isso, tossed isso, isso with roast paan, and isso with bathala chips. Yes.

name: Isso
description: Isso deals with isso. Curried isso, tossed isso, isso with roast paan, and isso with bathala chips. Yes.
PickMe is an app that lets you call cabs (trishaws, nanos, cars).  It mostly works and the company is responsive - we think they'll keep improving.
name: PickMe
Verandah Bistro & Bar
description: The Verandah Bistro is a lesser known hotel restaurant on the third floor of the Hilton Residences. It does average hotel food with a nice poolside view.
Everything from Lipton's Seat, to Lipton's Bungalow, to the Dambatenne Factory.
name: Sir Lipton's Estate

description: This small cinema has one hall with very comfortable lounge chairs (Gold) and another regular hall (Deluxe)
name: Empire Cineplex (Independence Arcade)
Cafe Mocha (by Barista)
description: Your regular Barista in a beautiful building.

name: Keshiya Bakes
description: A homebaker who makes one of our favourite choco chip cookies in town.
One of Sri Lanka's first vending machines, residing at Liberty Plaza.
name: Liberty Plaza Vending Machine
Awanhala Restaurant (Bentota)
description: වෙරළට ළං වෙන්න හදල තියෙන බාර් එකයි ඒක වටේට තියෙන පොල් අතු හට් ටිකයි නම් ඉර බැහැගෙන යන වෙලාවක නිවිහැනහිල්ලෙ බියර් උගුරක් තොල ගාන්න නියමයි.

name: Greenlands Hotel
description: Greenlands is a budget South-Indian joint that wins for nostalgia.

name: Burger King (Mount Lavinia)
description: To quote the Notorious BIG, it looks like Softlogic is representing BK to the fullest. The Whopper tastes authentic, the service is competent and the location is well equipped and smart. The restaurant doesn't go beyond the usual Burger King flavor, but it's not supposed to. It's very new, but we'd say that this franchise hits the mark.

name: Giovanni's
description: Giovanni's is a little Italian pizza place run by a chef who uses his own recipes, and serves fresh from a clay oven.

name: Sameeha Family Restaurant
description: Sameeha's is popular for their cheese kottu, and is one of THE places to drop into in Negombo.

name: Cafe Kumbuk
description: Simple and healthy, Kumbuk does everything right with local, seasonal and organic ingredients.

name: Chinaman
description: Generous portions, fair price and swift delivery make Chinaman good option for office lunch.
Allegedly one of the most scenic treks in the country, along the railway tracks from the Idalgashinna Station to the Ohiya Station.
name: Idalgashinna - Ohiya Railway Trek
California Grill (Galadari)
description: California Grill is one of the city's older fine dining restaurants, located at the rooftop of the Galadari Hotel. They serve a selection of seafood, steak and grills as well as a variety of flambé dishes.

name: KGN Burgers on Wheels
description: KGN Burgers on Wheels is a food truck on Hill Street that serves up some surprisingly tasty burgers. It's only a two man operation, but it's very efficient, clean and they seem to be a hit with the folks.

name: Pelican Restaurant (Kalutara)
description: හොඳට වායු සමනය කරල තියෙන භෝජනාගාරයේ ඇතුලෙන් බාර් එකේ පිවිසුම තියෙන එක නම් ඒ තරම්ම ගැලපෙන්නෙ නැති වුනත්...

name: Capital City Food Court (Badulla)
description: හොඳට ඉඩ කඩ තියෙන භෝජනාගාරයක ඉඳගෙන යාළුවෙක් එක්ක හරි පවුලේ උදවිය එක්ක හරි රසම රස චීන කෑම වේලක් රස බලන්න නම් බදුල්ලෙ Capital City Food Court එක කියාපු තැනක්.

name: Yumi Cake
description: Yumi Cake is a cute little restaurant that serves awesome desserts - chocolate fudge lovers, this is your haven.
A lovely little escape in the suburbs
address:
17/2, 
Sudharman Mawatha, 
Raja Maha Vihara Road, 
Pitakotte
name: Villa Escondite
Bliss Lounge
description: Bliss lounge is a Mediterranean sheesha lounge which serves Italian and burgers, among other things.

name: Sesto Senso
description: Words cannot describe this experience. Only tears.

name: Big Mama's
address:
Off Chandra Wettasinghe Mawatha,
Koswatte Road, 
Nawala
description: Big Mama's does Dutch food like lamprais, bolofiado, fougeti and olliebollen with a Sri Lankan twist.

name: Long Feng (Cinnamon Lakeside)
description: Long Feng has good service, but the food just doesn't push it far enough. It's fairly average Chinese, and within this hotel it should be more.
Second highest mountain in the country, with the highest accessible peak.
name: Kirigalpoththa (Hike)
Tosakanth's Roast Paan
description: As the name suggests, roast paan. Stuffed roastpaan.

විකසිත වුවද වියළී ගියද දිය ඇල්ලක් මනරම්ද
පාමුල හිඳද මුදුනත හිඳද දිය ඇල්ලක් නරඹම්ද
address: Visaree Falls, Bambaragasyaya, Hunuketiya, Ella, Uva.
name: Visaree Falls (Bambaragasyaya)
Brownie & CO.
description: Brownie pizzas.

name: COi by Vichalya
description: COi is a creative restaurant by one of Sri Lanka's best young chefs. Get ready for heavy hits of umami and some unusual combinations of Sri Lankan ingredients and Japanese style.
From World War II Royal Air Force operations to the end of the war, the museum takes you through our aviation history.
name: Air Force Museum
Kebabish
description: Kebabish is a new street side restaurant in Dehiwala that offers South Asian and Mediterranean cuisine. They maybe a small place but their big on taste.

name: Burgers Hut
address: Allen Avenue, Dehiwala (Opposite Nawalanka Food City)
description: Burger's Hut in Dehiwala was the first of the Burger's King clones, but a good one at that. We dropped in again after a while and we're happy to see that their burgers are still tasty and cheap. Unlike Burger's King though, BH is open from 1 pm.

name: Steam Boat (Moratuwa)
address: No. 34, New Galle road, Idama, Moratuwa.
description: හැබැයි මම නම් කියන්නෙ සති අන්තයෙ දවසක පවුලේ උදවියත් එක්ක මොරටුවෙ ස්ටීම් බෝට් එකට ගිහින් ඉටි පන්දම් එළියෙ ඉඳගෙන රෑ කෑම වේල රස බලන්න පුළුවන් වුකොත් ඒක හරි සුන්දර අත් දැකීමක් වේවි.

name: RTM Delights
description: යාළුවෙක්ගෙ හරි ආදරය කරන කෙනෙක්ගෙ හරි උපන් දින සාදයක අපූරු වෙනසක් කරන්නත්  RTM Delights එකේ කෑම වලට බැරි වෙන එකක් නෑ.

Ramani’s is a nice place and a good salon. It won't give you for money, but they're reliable and probably won’t ruin your hair. The staff – at the Nugegoda branch at least – are lovely. They haven’t changed in years, they remember all their clients and they’re just really, really sweet and friendly.
name: Ramani Fernando Salon

description: The Brick Lane Cookie Companie serves fresh cookies between the escalators of the Crescat Mall. It's a quick and tasty bite you can grab on your way up or down.
name: The Brick Lane Cookie Company (Crescat)
Semondu (Dutch Hospital)
description: Semondu is Sri Lankan airlines' attempt at semi-fine dining (yup, that's a word now). They serve up continental fusion cuisine, and for the most part, they do it well.

හුදෙකලා ජීවිතයක පාළුව තනිකම මකා ගන්නට සිතුවම් කලාවට දෑත හුරු කල සුන්දර මිනිසෙක්.
මිනිරන් තුඩකින් සුදු කොළයක් මතට ජීවමාන සිතුවම් ගෙනෙන කොණ්ඩ, රැවුල් කාරයෙක්.
name: Portraits by Janaka
Schakasz
description: Schakasz is a little cafe in Kirulapone exclusively for desserts. They've got everything from creme brulee to chocolate ganache cake, in large portions.
Bambaragama falls is the mother water fall of Ravana falls. It is at the top of Ravana falls.
name: Bambaragama Falls (Ambadandegama)
Grand Solis
description: A bar and restaurant that's great for its ambiance if you live in Nawala.
A fully-stocked wine cellar and alcohol shop
name: Favourite International Wine Cellar (Negombo)
Aakshathai
description: Solid ol' Saiva Kade in Jtown.

name: Indian Spice
description: Indian Spice is a low-key Indian restaurant that shares the premises with the equally modest, yet somewhat dodgy China Town. The place may give out a slightly dicey feel, but the food actually isn't half bad with a pretty legit butter chicken.

name: Upawansa Hotel & Bakery (Borella)
address: No. 46 A, D. S. Senanayake Mwt. ,Colombo 08.
description: හෝටලේ පාන්දර 5ට අරින නිසා පාසල් යන ළමයින්ට වගේ නම් ලොකු සේවයක් වෙනව ඇති. ඒත් කෑම වල රස ගැන හිතුවාම නම් ලොකු දුකක් තමයි දැනෙන්නෙ.

name: Gorgeous Cakes
description: A home baker who specializes in something other than cupcakes and cookies.

Pugzy's Kitchen is a home baker catering to our furry four-legged friends. Offering nutritious and tasty treats in pretty packaging, this is a fresh, welcome alternative to the unhealthy, dried snacks available at supermarkets.
name: Pugzy's Kitchen
Cherry Flower Chinese Restaurant
description: This place used to be good for Sri Lankanized Nasi Goreng, but they've let their standards drop, abysmally.
One of Colombo 07's top salons/spas.
name: Jaal Spa
Fort Rotti Restaurant
address: 36 Light House Street, YMBA Building, Fort, Galle.
description: Sells rotti, with sliced bananas and Kandos chocolate in the middle. They also have Lassi.

name: Arabian Knights
description: After an initial hiccup, Arabian Knights has bounced back well. The food is nearly back to their former glory, and coupled with the new venue, things are looking up again.
සුළු වාසි, ලාභ තකා රටක ඉතිහාසය පවා පාවා දෙන විදෙස් ගැතියනට වර්තමානයෙහිදී කට උත්තර නැතිව ගොස් ඇත්තේ රට පුරා මුල් බැසගෙන ඇති 'රාවණ' රාවයත් සමඟ මතුවන අනේක විද පුරා විද්‍යාත්මක සාක්ෂි සාධක නිසාවෙනි.
name: Kurullangala Rock Art (Karandagolla)
Church Street Social (The Fort Bazaar)
description: The Galle Fort's charming new boutique property

name: Mr. Biriyani (Hulftsdorp)
description: Biriyani, fried chicken, and burgers.
A music school and cafe by day and concert venue by night, Musicmatters is focused on high quality music education.
name: Musicmatters (Slave Island)

description: Rustic chic in Galle's unspoiled outskirts.
name: Jetwing Kurulubedda
Amaage Restaurant (Point Pedro)
description: Amaage is probably the largest restaurant in the area. They do decent kottu.

name: Banana Leaf
description: They do chicken biryani pretty darn good and now have crab and lamb on the menu.

name: Green Grass Hotel and Restaurant
address: No. 33, Aseervatham Lane, Hospital Road, Jaffna
description: One of the better eateries in Jaffna, with a wide variety of Northern Sri Lankan food
A&M cupcakes is a charming little cupcake boutique located on the Galle Road, opposite Barefoot. Cupcakes are trendy, tasty little treats - good for eating and even better for instagramming.
name: a & m Cupcakes
Hot Cabin (Diyatha Uyana)
description: කඩේ නම Hot Cabin. ලොකු ලොකු කෑම ජාති නම් නෑ. ඒ වුනාට හොඳ සුවඳක් නම් එනවා. සෙනඟත් ටිකක් ඉන්න නිසා අපි හිතුවා රෑ කෑම වේල ගන්න මෙතන ගැලපෙයි කියලා.

name: Mithuro Cafe
address: 9, R. A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 04
description: Mithuro Cafe does good rice and curry for cheap, and we especially love their 'chicken pieces' rotti.

7 Degrees North at Cinnamon Lakeside is actually one of the older bars in town now.  Their location by the Beira still makes for a great place to chill, and we like the fact that they're trying to keep things interesting with their ambitious cocktails but the execution has room for improvement.
name: 7 Degrees North (Cinnamon Lakeside)
JUCE Hotel
description: A super chill budget party hotel Down South.

name: Mithuro Cafe
address: 9, R. A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 04
description: Mithuro Cafe does good rice and curry for cheap, and we especially love their 'chicken pieces' rotti.
As far as safe bets go, Bayleaf is right up there. Good Italian fare at not too exorbitant prices, and a rather extensive menu to choose from.
name: The Bayleaf
Cosy Restaurant (Jaffna)
description: A hotel and restaurant, Cosy's dishes up Sri Lankan, Indian, and Chinese cuisine. We'd recommend sticking to the Jaffna specials. Obviously.

name: Tri Lanka
description: Sri Lanka's newest, chicest eco-resort.

name: Tosakanth's Roast Paan
description: As the name suggests, roast paan. Stuffed roastpaan.

සොබා දහමෙහි අපූර්වත්වයත් එහි ආශ්වාදයත් කුඩා කල සිටම මැනවින් දත් තෝමස් කඳු කරය පීරා මුහුදු මට්ටමේ සිට අඩි 5000කට ආසන්න උසකින් පිහිටි හපුතලේ, තංගමලේ ප්‍රදේශයෙන් උස් කඳු ගැටයක් මත වන තරමක් විශාල තැනිතලා භූමියක් සොයා ගත්තේය.
name: Adisham Bungalow (Haputale)
Greenlands Hotel
description: Greenlands is a budget South-Indian joint that wins for nostalgia.

The Portuguese called it Ilha das Vacas, the Dutch called it Delft, and the locals call it Neduntivu. Located in the Palk Strait, southwest of Jaffna, Delft is a relatively undiscovered tourist destination, ideal if you're interested in Sri Lankan history or sandy, white beaches
name: Delft (Neduntivu) Island
Carino Ice Cream
description: With both selling their goods on the open market the stage is set for open confrontation. It;s the established Corleones (Il Gelato) vs  the up and coming Tattaglias (Carinos) and of course YAMU is caught in the cross fire.

What a vibrant new place to stop at to get a bite to eat on the way out of Colombo... Cafe J - the newest eatery to hit the livening Negombo strip. Belonging to the Jetwing Group, this juice bar/patisserie/cafe is bright, clean and stylish, opening out onto the road on one side and the ocean on the other.
name: Cafe J
Tomato (Batticaloa)
description: Considered the only proper dine-in experience in Batticaloa, their Indian food is pretty good.

name: E-Cafe
description: E-Cafe has a nineties - early 2000s vibe going on, burgers, desserts, coffee, drinks, and bready stuff. All of them pretty good.
දෙපා යුගල දණ හිසින් නැමී එක මත එකය. දෑත ලිහිල්ව උකුල මතය. දෑස පියවී ගොසිනි. ආශ්වාසයත් ප්‍රාශ්වාසයත් මාගේ නාස් පුඩු අගට හොඳින් දැනෙන්ට විය. ඒ උන් වහන්සේ මා හට කියා දුන් ආනා පාන සතියයි…
address: Rakkhiththa Kanda Rajamaha Viharaya, Karandagolla, Ella, Uva.
name: Rakkhiththa Kanda Hermitage (Karandagolla)

description: A reliable and hassle-free passport delivery service.
name: Delivery Malli
EEAT
description: Small and underwhelming, EEAT is okay for a chinese roll and woodapple milkshake.

name: Which Way West
address: 1st Floor, Liberty Arcade, 282, R. A. Re Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
description: Which Way West is a new pub that serves up okay food.

name: Ananda Hotel & Bakery (Borella)
description: ෂහ්, ටොප් එකට තියෙනවා. මිරිස් හොද්දෙ නමටම හරියන්න හොඳ ගාණට සැර. ඒ විතරක්ද බැදපු තුන පහ ටිකකුත් පදමට එකතු කරලා. පරිප්පු හොද්ද නම් ගෙදර හැදුව වගේ රසයි.
A charming little hotel that feels like a home.
name: Kikili House
Domenico's
description: Domenico's, headed by the former chef at Santoré was great addition to Colombo's pizza scene in 2014. Now they've expanded their menu with some much needed meats and it's that much better.
A weekly, eco-friendly, organic produce market in Batticaloa.
address: Bridge City and Village, near Kallady Bridge, Batticaloa
name: Bridge Market (Batticaloa)
Jack Tree
description: Jack Tree's food is pretty tasty, if you eat here you're probably going to eat till it hurts a little to walk. It is however, pricey. Is it authentic Thai? We didn't think so, you get food here that the Sri Lankan palate is quite used to.
A charming beachside property on the Matara bay.
name: Amaloh by Jetwing

description: Don's Deli is a little bakery on Marine Drive that doubles as a favourite spot for lamprais, and they also serve seafood at Fat Crab upstairs.
name: Don's Deli

description: Little Adam's Peak in Ella offers splendid views and a not-too-hard trek. There's a secondary peak a little way off which is even better.
name: Little Adam's Peak (Ella)
The Stamford
description: Cocktail bar on Horton Place above Grande Gourmet at Nirj's.

name: Makye Ame
description: A mix of authentic and Sri Lankanized Chinese food, run by the friendliest Chinese lady.

name: Ginger
description: Ginger's a small Bistro that offers a mix of Asian Flavours. They've got a cozy space with some nice curry dishes, but are also quite pricey.

name: Down Town Rotti Hut (Ella)
address: Ella Village Inn, Down Town Rotti Hut, Ella
description: රසම රස උදේ කෑම, දවල් කෑම, රෑ කෑම වේලක් කන්න හරි හොඳ තේකක් නැත්නම් ස්වාභාවික පළතුරු යුෂ එකක් බොන්න හරි හ්ම්ම්.. හවස් වෙලා පොඩි ෂොට් එකක් දාන්න ඉන්නවනම් ඒකට සුපිරි බයිට් එකක් ගන්න වුනත් නියම තැනක්

name: Scarlet Room (Colombo Courtyard)
description: The Scarlet room is Colombo Courtyard's Italian restaurant. Their all red theme may not appeal to some, but we found the food to be surprisingly affordable. Execution was a mixed bag, with a few dishes missing the mark and others doing quite well.
Stunning Harry-Potter-esque vistas of trains and trees. Also, the Nine Arch Bridge is an iconic brick-and-stone built bridge.
name: Nine Arches Bridge (Demodara)
Thulasi Hotel (Badulla)
address: Thulasi Hotel, Udaya Raja mawatha, Badulla.
description: ආයෙ දවසක බදුල්ල පැත්තෙ රවුමක් දාන්න ඇවිත් පාන්දරින්ම බැස්සත් හිතට බයක් නෑනෙ. අංකල්ගෙ තුලසි හෝටලේ උදේ 6ට අරිනවනෙ.

name: Snog (Froyo)
description: Snog is a brand new frozen yoghurt cafe in Bamba, that strays from conventional froyos. It's relatively affordable and works well on warm days, but some of the flavours do come across as artificial.
